item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454!

What: Impromptu Breakfast at Plymouth?

When: November 21, 2009 9:00 AM

Where: (A location has not been chosen yet.)

Anyone up for breakfast at PYM? Should be a nice and easy flight. Even qualifies as a cross country if you need the logged time.

http://www.navmonster...

I was told today that the Marlbough EAA Chapter will be using FIT for a Young Eagles event tomorrow. They don't have many kids coming and didn't seem to need our help. They did mention that one of the major TV networks would be coming there about 9:00. We might want to stick around until 9:30 or so to see how it goes then fly out.

We can play it all out in the morning....

This was Mark Estabrooks idea, BTW...

See ya all then,

Charley

Learn more here:
http://www.meetup.com...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Impromptu Breakfast at Plymouth?
